author: vmassol
msg: This is really a new addition rather than a bug fix

author: vmassol
msg: normalize all names with uppercase for first letters only

author: vmassol
msg: Added Kazuhito as a contributor in the hall of fame :-) Thanks Kazuhito!

author: vmassol
msg: - Added new FormAuthentication.setExpectedAuthResponse(int) that allows to set the expected HTTP response code for an authentication request which should be successful. If not specified, it defaults to HttpURLConnection.HTTP_MOVED_TEMP.

- Added new FormAuthentication.setExpectedPreAuthResponse(int) that allows to set the expected HTTP response code for a request to a restricted resource without authenticated principal. If not specified, it defaults to HttpURLConnection.HTTP_MOVED_TEMP.
- Added new FormAuthentication.setSessionCookieName(String) that allows to set the security cookie name to a name different than JSESSIONID (the default).
- FormAuthentication no longer assumes "localhost" when adding cookies.
